## Runtime.Context.ContextQualifierProvider class

Abstract base class for implementing context qualifier providers. Provides common functionality and enforces the contract for derived classes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class ContextQualifierProvider implements IContextQualifierProvider 
```
**Implements:** IContextQualifierProvider
